
l = 3
f = np.ones(l + 1) / l
f[0] = 0
F = np.cumsum(f)
G = np.ones_like(F) - F
num = 30
p = np.ones(num)
for n in range(1, num):
    p[n] = labda / mu * sum(p[n - 1 - i] * G[i] for i in range(min(n, l)))
    print(n, p[n])
